thread.title: M.D.
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by M.D.

author: M.D.
title: M.D.
text: I have enjoyed using Matboard and more for my home decoration projects but the last time I ordered it was for matboard for three pictures - school shot of my grandchildren. The shipping costs exceeded the cost of the matboard. I am now thinking of buying my own cutting tools and using my local arts and crafts store to avoid this charge in the future.
